# Calvia Real Estate
> Free property matching service for buyers and sellers in Calvia, Mallorca

## About
Calvia Real Estate connects property buyers and home owners with vetted local estate agencies across the Calvia municipality in southwest Mallorca, Spain. The service is free for end users. We cover Bendinat, Portals Nous, Illetes, Santa Ponsa, Palmanova, Son Vida, Sol de Mallorca, Costa den Blanes, Costa de la Calma, Paguera, and Calvia Village.
